mapper.select: select personnel_id, personnel_car_price, personnel_phone, insurance_inser_include_id, personnel_license_plate, insurance_city_id, personnel_new_car_flag from insurance.insurance_personnel_information where personnel_id = #{personnelId}

select personnel_id, personnel_car_price, personnel_phone, insurance_inser_include_id, personnel_license_plate, insurance_city_id, personnel_new_car_flag from insurance.insurance_personnel_information limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into insurance.insurance_personnel_information(personnel_car_price, personnel_phone, insurance_inser_include_id, personnel_license_plate, insurance_city_id, personnel_new_car_flag) values (#{personnelCarPrice}, #{personnelPhone}, #{insuranceInserIncludeId}, #{personnelLicensePlate}, #{insuranceCityId}, #{personnelNewCarFlag})
mapper.update:
update insurance.insurance_personnel_information
personnel_car_price = #{personnelCarPrice},
personnel_phone = #{personnelPhone},
insurance_inser_include_id = #{insuranceInserIncludeId},
personnel_license_plate = #{personnelLicensePlate},
insurance_city_id = #{insuranceCityId},
personnel_new_car_flag = #{personnelNewCarFlag},
where personnel_id = #{personnelId}
